EmailTemplate.name: Sydney Cloud Foundry Meetup 2015Q4.Sydney meetup email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for the November 26th Cloud Foundry meetup in Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SYDNEY CLOUD FOUNDRY MEETUP! Join us for the next Cloud Foundry meetup in Sydney. The schedule is as follows:
6:00PM Check-in, Beer, Pizza & Networking 6:30PM Talks
- Delivering simple, clear, fast, humane government services with Cloud Foundry - Lindsay Holmwood, Digital Transformation Office - Using Watson Cognitive services in Bluemix to create a virtual doctor app - IBM - Best practices for deploying apps to Cloud Foundry for developers - Mik Freedman, Engineering Manager Pivotal Labs
We look forward to having you join us!
Sign Up today!
REGISTER <http://www.meetup.com/Sydney-Cloud-Foundry-Meetup/events/226553811/> Cloud Foundry Ultimo, Sydney THURSDAY November 26 6:00PM REGISTER <http://www.meetup.com/Sydney-Cloud-Foundry-Meetup/events/226553811/>
